name: magnumt
text: We all wish to be at least half as classy as Vlad the King of Makeouts.

text: I wish, but I'm only the Earl of Second Base... and I think Norfolk.

text: The mental image of Vlad making out with Philippe's mom is too much to bear.

text: otter.

text: this comment... owns!!!

text: To quote Teodor, EEEEEEEAUUGH

text: Poetry in motion. Vlad, we love you.

name: gouldgonewild
text: She blinded me with science!

name: rotating-dog
text: Dolby ref: so bad, it's bad. consider yourself chubbed.

name: gouldgonewild
text: Hey, aren't  you the guy who was yelling at me about Wings?

text: A comment left by rotating-dog was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, Cycerin, Overmedicated, godfatherofsouls)

name: overmedicated
text: Didn't you learn

name: dusty
text: A person who still quotes the Simpson is like a cowboy who will not shoot his crippled horse, and instead keeps it in a kiddy pool under a giant beach umbrella, and brings it blended up oat smoothies.

name: lawdog
text: The puf heard around the world.

name: 1000hz
text: Philippe has a cell phone. And he is five. And Vlad is totally using it to mack on his mom.

name: landowmpg
text: I imagine that his mom bought him the cell phone, and it can only dial her number, and can only receive calls from her.  This is what I imagine.

name: underpantstime
text: hmm, i wonder why philippe's mom appears to be very old when philippe's only 5. guess i gotta hit up wikipedia for some otter reproductive system info.

name: spectre
text: ALT text: "No is Phillipe. Is Vlad."

name: spectre
text: ALWAYS happens, in the middle of a ma, hot party, MOM calls. "Kill the music, guys -- and stop that screaming!" Don't make her come over there!

name: spectre
text: Ever notice how much Phillipe's mom looks like Sondra Smuckles (Ray's mom)? It's the hairdo.

name: fermatprime
text:
OR IS IT?

We don't know Philippe's last name, or the identity of LN's parent (Ray's sibling), and have you ever seen Philippe's mom and Sondra in the same place at the same time? I didn't think so!

There may be more to this!

name: fox
text:
maybe I missed something along the way, but why does phillipe not live with his mother?

he got kicked out didn't he...

name: caseyb3
text:
Because Philippe's mom lives in Ohio.

Vlad: keep an eye on that mechanical Polish fucker or he'll become your new father the first chance he gets.

name: _cheesekayke
text: Philippe's mom is the most hilarious-looking lady in the universe.

name: professoryes
text: With an outfit like that, how could she NOT get retirement breakfasts at Denny's?

name: betwixt
text: i don't get what vlad does in the last panel. blowing? whistling? trying to sound like a summer breeze?

name: straw
text: Is beink wind of thousand memories.

name: bourbonsamurai
text:
Does this vaugely imply to anyone else that Vlad is Phillipe's father? No? Just me?
Phew.

text: If Phillipe was half robot, it would explain why he doesn't age...

text: GILF ON ROBOT ON OTTER ACTION ONLY AVAILABLE AT ACHEWOODPORN4U.RU

text: This is exactly how my parents met.

text: Phillipe's mom sure got old in the last eight years.
